dialogs.npcText:
Mate ook oook. 
 *This monkey appears to be attempting to learn how to boomerang.*

Ooooh ooh aaaaah! 
 *The monkey screeches, and perfectly arches the boomerang around a nearby obstacle.*

Eeeeek! 
 *The monkey, now angry, throws the boomerang out of visibility. He turns to you, smiles, and gets hit in the head.*
*The monkey lies motionless. His boomerang lies shamefully next to him.*
